description.message: Send a given URL including the session context (cookies) of the current tab, bundled as json to a configurable target.

default_title_inactive.description: Extension icon tooltip when extension is inactive.

target_helper_text.message: Please enter a valid URL (http[s]://<host>[:<port>][/<path>][?<query params>]).

target_input_error.message: This is not a valid URL.
target_input_error.description: Remote target URL validation error text.

settings_save_error.message: An error occurred while trying to save your settings.
settings_save_error.description: Message when saving settings have failed.

log_set_target.description: Display message when saving the target.

delete_all_button.description: Delete all filter results button text.

none.description: Will be displayed, when no cookies were found.

download_sent.description: Success message when server acknowledged transmission.

no_downloads_listed.message: There are no downloads listed yet.
